name: Brigid
description:
Fly around like a butterfly and give nature a hand by fertilizing in order to discover the true colors of the landscape.

Goal

Catch pollen from the air by flying, and release them above the vegetation to let it grow. There are several flowers too, I hope you can find them!

Controls

1) Press ENTER in the main menu to play

2) ARROW KEYS  /  WASD to  fly

3) SPACEBAR to let go of pollen

Music

Walking Within Infinity - Jordan Winslow

Brigid is a game created for #GreatSpringGameJam2021.
